config.question: Which of the following prompted the impeachment of President Johnson?

choices.content: unilateral action by Johnson to reorganize the South into five military districts
use of the Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments as the basis for readmission to the Union
vetoing the Civil Rights Act of 1866
removal of Edwin Stanton from the post of head of the War Department

answer_3.response: Consider This: President Johnson objected to the Tenure of Office Act, claiming that the restrictions violated the constitutional doctrine of the separation of powers. In 1867, action taken by President Johnson was considered to have violated that very act. See L.O. 16.1 What conflicts arose consecutively involving President Lincoln and then President Johnson and Congress during Reconstruction?
